title: _DVD_COPYRIGHT_DESCRIPTOR (ntddcdvd.h)
description: The DVD_COPYRIGHT_DESCRIPTOR structure is used in conjunction with the IOCTL_DVD_READ_STRUCTURE request to retrieve a DVD copyright descriptor.
